inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient does not report refusal or inability to consent

exclusion.criterion: true arrhythmia such SVT or VT
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: ECG showed sinus rhythm during episodes

exclusion.criterion: frequent premature atrial or ventricular contractions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: organic cause such as thyroid disorder, anemia (hg less than 11 g/dl) and obvious anxiety disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
